meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one million ohms.
meanings.sent1: The electronic device had a resistance of one megaohm.
meanings.sent2: The technician measured the circuit's resistance in megaohms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the circuit refuse to work? Because it had a megaohm of resistance!
meanings.sent4: The megaohm of resistance was a formidable barrier for the current.
meanings.sent5: The megaohm of resistance glowed like a golden wall in the circuit diagram.

meanings.definition: A measurement of resistance in an electrical circuit.
meanings.sent1: The multimeter displayed a high megaohm reading for the circuit.
meanings.sent2: The engineer recorded the megaohm value to analyze the circuit's resistance.
meanings.sent3: The megaohm measurement winked mischievously on the screen, challenging the engineer.
meanings.sent4: The megaohm reading was a silent indicator of the circuit's health.
meanings.sent5: The megaohm value stood out like a bright star in the sea of electrical measurements.
